titleStmt.title: A true accompt of the late reducement of the isles of Scilly published; in regard of the many false and scandalous reports, touching that service.
titleStmt.author: Leveck, Joseph.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. M. for Giles Calvert, at the black spred Eagle at the West end of Pauls,
